module.name: blobSpotter
module.description: Process camera images to directly extract available blobs
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the GNU GPL v2.0
module.description-long: This module allows providing blobs by directly processing camera images. Therefore, it does replace lumaChroma and blobExtractor.

param.desc: To specify the module's name; all the open ports will be tagged with the prefix /name
To specify the minimum area for segmenting
To specify the maximum area for segmenting
To specify the maximum top bound on the Y axis

input.description: Receive x y coordinates to specify ROI areas and accumulate them internally. On newHist command, the internal coordinates buffer gets cleared and once two points defining the ROI are received in a row, then the histogram is recomputed.

output.description: Stream out the images displaying blobs countours.
Stream out the binary images displaying all blobs.
Stream out a yarp list containing the blobs bounding box.
